ComicInfo.Summary:
“OUTER ASPECTS OF INNER ATTITUDES,” Part Three
Tajo makes a desperate final attempt to save what’s left of the city of Salus, but the darkness in her past threatens to engulf the embers of hope.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-----------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Greg Tocchini & Dave McCaig | 1 | | B | Cover B | Stéphane Roux | 2 |
